author: ppoddar
msg: OPENJPA-1334: i) Calibrate type-based cache eligibility logic to align better with new JPA 2 as well as previous @DataCache behavior.
ii) Use CacheMode settings via FetchPlan.
iii) Cleanup hint handler etc. Replace implementation by interface.
iv) Start organizing JPA property processing

author: chammers
msg: Create .zip file with identical content as the PEAR .tgz.
Too bad that the PEAR version number may not (it's validated) contain
the -SNAPSHOT so the it has to be specified separately. I could not
find out how to elegantly use sed or a regex in the pom.xml.
